Html:
Hello,

I'm using RAWR as a profile creator for simcraft (hunters not supported in rawr). I simply just want to edit items/entchants and then saving the profile without RAWR updating the dps and stopping my pc from working for 5sec.

So how can I stop RAWR from updating the DPS every time I change something? It's pretty annoying :/

 

Thank you
The short answer is you can't. You can speed things up a bit if you make less gems/enchants marked as available.
